title: High Frequency Trading and Machine Learning Workshops by Two​ Road​ Tech
description: IEEE-NITK​ in​ association​ with​​ Two​ Roads​ Te​ ch​ presented​ 'High​ Frequency​ Trading​ and​ Machine Learning​ Workshop'.​ It​ gave​ insights​ as​ to​ Discover​ how​ thousands​ of​ trades​ are​ executed​ by tiny​ pieces​ of​ code,​ how​ traders​ use​ economic​ indicators​ to​ generate​ profit,​ how​ algorithm challenges​ in​ industry​ are​ approached​ and​ much​ more!​ Two​ Roads​ tech​ organised​ this​ event mainly​ for​ Final​ year​ B.Tech​ and​ M.tech.​ they​ were​ also​ looking​ for​ giving​ an​ opportunity​ for these​ students​ to​ hire​ them​ off-campus,​ offering​ salary​ of​ 20-25​ lakhs.​ Event​ was​ exclusive​ for 3rd​ and​ 4th​ year​ B.Tech​ students​ and​ M.Tech​ Students.​ T-shirts​ and​ goodies​ were​ given​ for participants​ as​ well.
